phrases: Water.
Earth.
Fire.
Air.
Long ago, the four nations lived together in harmony.
Then, everything changed when the Fire Nation attacked.
Only the Avatar, master of all four elements, could stop them.
But when the world needed him most, he vanished.
A hundred years passed, and my brother and I discovered the new Avatar...
And although his airbending skills are great.
He has a lot to learn before he is ready to save anyone.
But I believe Aang can save the world.
Great, you are back!
What is for dinner?
We have got a few options.
First, round nuts and some kind of oval shaped nuts,...
Dig in!
Seriously, what else ya got?
What was that!?
It is coming from over there!
Should not we run away from huge booms... not toward them?
An earthbender!
Let us go meet him!
He looks dangerous, so we better approach cautiously.
Hello there, I am Katara!
What is your name?
Nice to meet you!
We just wanted to say hi.
Hey, that guy's got to be running somewhere,...
Which means no nuts for dinner!
Hey!
I worked hard to get those nuts!
Yeh, I hate'them too.
Great hat.
I will trade you some nuts for it.
Hey!
Hi, mom.
Where have you been, Haru?
You are late!
Get started on your chores.
Hey, you are that kid!
Why did you run away before?
Uh, you must have me confused with some other kid.
No she does not, we saw you earthbending.
They saw you doing what?
They are crazy, mom, I mean, look at how they are dressed!
You know how dangerous that is!
You know what would happen if they caught you earthbending!
Open up!
Fire Nation!
Act natural!
What do you want?
I have already paid you this week.
The tax just doubled.
Would not want an accident, would we?
Fire is sometimes so hard to control.
You can keep the copper ones.
Nice guy.
How long has the Fire Nation been here?
Five years.
Fire Lord Ozai uses our town's coal mines to fuel his ships.
They are thugs, they steal from us,...
Quiet, Haru.
Do not talk like that.
But, Haru's an earthbender, he can help.
Earthbending is forbidden.
It is caused nothing but misery for this village.
He must never use his abilities.
How can you say that?
Haru has a gift.
Asking him not to earthbend is like asking me not to waterbend.
It is a part of who we are.
You do not understand.
I understand that Haru can help you fight back.
What can the Fire Nation do to you that they have not done already?
They could take Haru away!
Like they took his father.
My mom said you can sleep here tonight, but you should leave in the morning.
Thanks.
I will make sure Appa does not eat all your hay.
I am sorry about what I said earlier.
I did not know about your father.
That is ok.
It is funny, the way you were talking back in the store, it reminded me of him.
Thanks.
My father was very courageous.
When the Fire Nation invaded,...
He sounds like a great man.
After the attack,...
We have not seen them since.
So, that is why you hide your earthbending?
Yeh.
The problem is that the only way I can feel close to my father now...
See this necklace?
My mother gave it to me.
It is beautiful.
I lost my mother in a Fire Nation raid.
This necklace is all I have left of her.
It is not enough, is it?
No.
Help!
The mine!
Help me!
It is not working, we have to get help.
There is no time... pull harder.
Haru, there is a way you can help him.
I cannot.
Please, there is no one around to see you, it is the only way.
Haru, you did it!
It was so brave of Haru to use his earthbending to help that old man.
You must have really inspired him.
I guess so.
Everyone should get some sleep.
We are leaving at dawn.
Dawn?
Cannot we sleep in for once?
Absolutely not!
This village is crawling with Fire Nation troops.
If they discover you are here, Aang, we will be eating fireballs for breakfast.
Good night.
I would rather eat fireballs than nuts.
Good night.
That is him!
That is the earthbender!
They took him!
They took Haru away!
What?
The old man turned him in to the Fire Nation.
It is all my fault, I forced him into earthbending.
Slow down, Katara, when did this happen?
Haru's mother said they came for him at midnight.
Then it is too late to track him, he is long gone.
We do not need to track him.
The Fire Nation is going to take me right to Haru.
Because they are going to arrest me for earthbending.
I thought you were crazy at first, Katara, but this might work.
There are ventilation shafts throughout these mines,...
The boulder levitates and... tada!
Fake earthbending.
Aang.
Did you get all that?
Sure, I got it.
Do you remember your cue?
Yeh, yeh, just relax.
You are taking all the fun out of this.
By this do you mean intentionally getting captured...
Exactly!
That is fun stuff.
Here they come!
Get in your places!
Get out of my way, pipsqueak!
How dare you call me pipsqueak you giant-eared cretin!
What did you call me?
A giant-eared cretin!
Look at those things.
Do herds of animals use them for shade?
You better back off!
Seriously... back off.
I will not back off!
I bet elephants get together and make fun of how large your ears are!
That is it... you are going down!
I will show you who is boss... earthbending style!
I said, earthbending style!
That lemur!
It is earthbending!
No, you idiot!
It is the girl!
Oh, of course.
I will hold her!
You have got 12 hours to find Haru, we will be right behind you.
Momo, you have some big ears!
She will be fine, Aang, Katara knows what she is doing.
I am your warden.
I prefer to think of you not as prisoners, but as honored guests,...
You will succeed here if you simply abide...
What kind of guest dishonors his host by interrupting him!?
Take him below!
One week in solitary will improve his manners.
Simply treat me with the courtesy I give you and we will get along famously.
You will notice earthbenders, that this rig is made entirely of metal.
You are miles away from any rock or earth, so if you have any illusions about...
Good day.
Katara?
Haru!
What are you doing here?
It is my fault you were captured.
I came to rescue you.
So, you got yourself arrested?
It was the only way to find you.
You got guts, Katara, I will give you that.
Come one, there is someone I want you to meet.
Katara, this is my father, Tyro.
Dad, this is Katara.
It is an honor to meet you.
Have some dinner, Katara.
It is not as bad as it looks.
It is still pretty bad though.
Tyro, the prisoners are complaining there are not enough blankets to go around.
I will talk to the guards.
In the meantime, make sure the elderly are taken care of.
The rest of us will simply have to hope for warmer weather.
If you do not mind me asking, what is your escape plan?
Excuse me?
You know, the plan to get everyone off the rig?
What is it?
Mutiny?
Sabotage?
The plan?
The plan is to survive... wait out this war.
Hope that one day some of us can get back home and forget this ever happened.
How can you say that?
You sound like you have already given up.
Katara, I admire your courage and I envy your youth,...
The Warden is a ruthless man, and he will not stand for any rebellion.
I am sorry, but we are powerless.
We will see about that.
Earthbenders!
You do not know me, but I know of you.
Every child of my water tribe village was rocked to sleep with stories of the brave...
Some of you may think that the Fire Nation has made you powerless.
Yes, they have taken away your ability to bend,...
Because it runs deeper than any mine you have been forced to dig,...
It is the strength of your hearts that make you who you are,...
The time to fight back is now!
I can tell you the Avatar has returned!
So remember your courage, earthbenders, let us fight for our freedom!
Your 12 hours are up, where is Haru?
We have got to get out of here.
I cannot.
We do not have much time, there are guards everywhere.
Get on.
Katara, what is wrong?
I am not leaving.
I am not giving up on these people.
What do you mean you are not leaving!?
We cannot abandon these people.
There has to be a way to help them.
Maybe she is right.
What do you say, Sokka?
I say you are both crazy!
Last chance, we need to leave... now!
No.
I hate when you get like this.
Come on, we better hide.
Look!
Tell me exactly what you saw.
Well, Sir, it looked like a flying bison.
What?
It was a giant flying buffalo, Sir, with an empty saddle.
Which was it?
A buffalo or a bison?
Uh, I am not sure what the difference is, but that is not really the point is it, Sir?
I will decide what the point is, fool!
You!
Wake up the Captain.
Search the entire rig!
Sir?
What!?
That... was the Captain you just threw overboard, so...
Then wake up someone I have not thrown overboard and search the rig!
There is something going on here and I do not like it.
We do not have much time.
What are we going to do?
I wish I knew how to make a hurricane.
The Warden would run away and we would steal his keys!
Would not he just take his keys with him?
I am just tossing ideas around.
I tired talking the earthbenders into fighting back, but it did not work.
If there was just a way to help them help themselves.
For that they would need some kind of earth, or some rock... something they can bend.
But this entire place is made of metal.
No, it is not.
Look at the smoke.
I bet they are burning coal...
In other words, earth.
It is almost dawn, we are running out of time!
Are you sure this is going to work?
It should.
These vents reminded me of our little trick back at the village.
We are going to do the same thing, but on a much bigger scale.
There is a huge deposit of coal at the base of the silo,...
When he does his airbending, the coal only has one place to go... right back here.
There is the intruder!
Stay back, I am warning you!
Katara stop!
You cannot win this fight!
Listen to him well, child.
You are one mistake away from dying where you stand.
Here is your chance, earthbenders!
Take it!
Your fate is in your own hands!
Foolish girl!
You thought a few inspirational words and some coal would change these people?
Look at these blank, hopeless faces.
There spirits were broken a long time ago.
Oh?
But you still believe in them?
How sweet.
They are a waste of your energy, little girl.
You have failed.
Show no mercy!
For the Earth Kingdom, attack!
Get to the ship!
We will hold them off!
Do not let them escape!
Guys, throw me some coal!
No, please!
I cannot swim!
Do not worry, I hear cowards float.
I want to thank you for saving me.
For saving us.
All it took was a little coal.
It was not the coal, Katara, it was you.
Thank you for helping me find my courage, Katara, of the water tribe.
My family and everyone here owes you much.
So, I guess you are going home now?
Yes, to take back my village.
To take back all of our villages!
The Fire Nation will regret the day they set foot on our land!
Come with us.
I cannot.
Your mission is to take back your home.
Ours is to get Aang to the North Pole.
That is him, is not it?
The Avatar.
Katara, thank you for bringing my father back to me.
I never thought I would see him again.
I only wish there was some way...
I know.
My mother's necklace!
It is gone!
